languages.text: "Да. Номос помнят. Ты принес{mf||ла} нам цифро-пищу, и в ней было имя — Эпитафия. Мы узнали его. Нет, не так. За этим именем мы узнали место, откуда происходят Номос".
"Yes. Nomos remember. You brought us data-sustenance, and it contained a name — Epitaph. We recognised it. No, not like that. In that name we recognised the place where Nomos originate."
languages.original_text: "Да. Номос помнят. Ты принес{mf||ла} нам цифро-пищу, и в ней было имя — Эпитафия. Мы узнали его. Нет, не так. За этим именем мы узнали место, откуда происходят Номос".

traits.locale_text: "Yes. Nomos remember. You brought us data-sustenance, and it contained a name — Epitaph. We recognised it. No, not like that. In that name we recognised the place where Nomos originate."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: "Yes. Nomos remember. You brought us data-sustenance, and it contained a name — Epitaph. We recognised it. No, not like that. In that name we recognised the place where Nomos originate."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: "Yes. Nomos remember. You brought us data-sustenance, and it contained a name — Epitaph. We recognised it. No, not like that. In that name we recognised the place where Nomos originate."

traits.locale_text: "Yes. Nomos remember. You brought us data-sustenance, and it contained a name — Epitaph. We recognised it. No, not like that. In that name we recognised the place where Nomos originate."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: «Sí. Nomos lo recuerda. Nos trajo sustento de datos que contenía un nombre: Epitafio. Lo reconocimos. No en ese sentido. En ese nombre reconocimos el lugar de origen de Nomos».
languages.original_text: "Yes. Nomos remember. You brought us data-sustenance, and it contained a name — Epitaph. We recognised it. No, not like that. In that name we recognised the place where Nomos originate."

traits.locale_text: «Sí. Nomos lo recuerda. Nos trajo sustento de datos que contenía un nombre: Epitafio. Lo reconocimos. No en ese sentido. En ese nombre reconocimos el lugar de origen de Nomos».
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: 「はい。ノモス、覚えている。あなたは我々にデータ格納機を渡し、中に『エピタフ』という名前が含まれていた。この名前は見たことがある。明確に言うと、その名前に我々はノモスの起源を見た」
languages.original_text: "Yes. Nomos remember. You brought us data-sustenance, and it contained a name — Epitaph. We recognised it. No, not like that. In that name we recognised the place where Nomos originate."

traits.locale_text: 「はい。ノモス、覚えている。あなたは我々にデータ格納機を渡し、中に『エピタフ』という名前が含まれていた。この名前は見たことがある。明確に言うと、その名前に我々はノモスの起源を見た」
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: “是的，诺莫斯还记得这件事。你给我们带来了数据，里面包含了一个名字——荒垄碑碣。我们认出了它。不，不仅如此，我们还这个名字中辨认出了诺莫斯的起源地。”
languages.original_text: "Yes. Nomos remember. You brought us data-sustenance, and it contained a name — Epitaph. We recognised it. No, not like that. In that name we recognised the place where Nomos originate."

traits.locale_text: “是的，诺莫斯还记得这件事。你给我们带来了数据，里面包含了一个名字——荒垄碑碣。我们认出了它。不，不仅如此，我们还这个名字中辨认出了诺莫斯的起源地。”
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: « Oui, nous nous souvenons. Vous nous avez nourris de données qui contenaient un nom : Épitaphe. Nous l'avons reconnu. Non, pas comme vous l'entendez. Nous avons reconnu dans ce nom l'endroit d'où nous venons. »
languages.original_text: "Yes. Nomos remember. You brought us data-sustenance, and it contained a name — Epitaph. We recognised it. No, not like that. In that name we recognised the place where Nomos originate."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, nous nous souvenons. Vous nous avez nourris de données qui contenaient un nom : Épitaphe. Nous l'avons reconnu. Non, pas comme vous l'entendez. Nous avons reconnu dans ce nom l'endroit d'où nous venons. »
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Ja. Nomos erinnern sich. Ihr habt uns Datennahrung gebracht, und sie enthielt einen Namen — Epitaph. Wir haben ihn erkannt. Nein, nicht so. In diesem Namen haben wir den Ort erkannt, von dem Nomos stammen."
languages.original_text: "Yes. Nomos remember. You brought us data-sustenance, and it contained a name — Epitaph. We recognised it. No, not like that. In that name we recognised the place where Nomos originate."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Nomos erinnern sich. Ihr habt uns Datennahrung gebracht, und sie enthielt einen Namen — Epitaph. Wir haben ihn erkannt. Nein, nicht so. In diesem Namen haben wir den Ort erkannt, von dem Nomos stammen."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Evet. Nomos hatırlıyor. Bize veri besini getirdiniz, içinde bir isim vardı: Sinyazıt. Bunu tanıdık. Hayır, öyle değil. Bu isimde Nomos'un kökeni olan yeri gördük."
languages.original_text: "Yes. Nomos remember. You brought us data-sustenance, and it contained a name — Epitaph. We recognised it. No, not like that. In that name we recognised the place where Nomos originate."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Nomos hatırlıyor. Bize veri besini getirdiniz, içinde bir isim vardı: Kitabe. Bunu tanıdık. Hayır, öyle değil. Bu isimde Nomos'un kökeni olan yeri gördük."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
